course: Heating, Ventilation, and Air Conditioning (HVAC) Course

classes.title: Fundamentals of HVAC Systems
topics: Introduction to HVAC systems
Basic principles of heating, ventilation, and air conditioning
Role and importance of HVAC in building environments
Historical context and development of HVAC systems

classes.title: Types and Selection of A/C System
topics: Overview of different types of air conditioning systems
Factors to consider when selecting an A/C system
Efficiency and energy considerations
Environmental impact of different refrigerants

classes.title: Ventilation System
topics: Importance of ventilation in indoor air quality
Types of ventilation systems (natural, mechanical, mixed-mode)
Ventilation standards and regulations
Design principles for effective ventilation

classes.title: Humidification and Dehumidification
topics: Understanding humidity control in HVAC systems
Importance of maintaining proper indoor humidity levels
Methods of humidification and dehumidification
Effects of humidity on comfort and health

classes.title: Central Air Conditioning Project
topics: Overview of a central air conditioning system project
Project planning, design, and execution
Case studies of real-world projects
Challenges and best practices

classes.title: Psychometric Chart Application
topics: Introduction to psychrometrics
Using psychrometric charts for HVAC system design
Determining air properties, dew point, and enthalpy
Application in heating and cooling processes

classes.title: Duct and Pipe Design
topics: Designing air ducts and piping systems for HVAC
Material selection and sizing
Calculating pressure drops and energy losses
Duct and pipe layout and routing

classes.title: Selection of Equipment
topics: Equipment selection criteria and considerations
Role and importance of chillers, fan coil units (FCUs), air handling units (AHUs), pumps, fans, and exhaust systems
Energy efficiency and capacity considerations

classes.title: Design Drawing Discussion
topics: Review and analysis of design drawings for a specific project
Identification of key design elements
Practical application of design principles

classes.title: Design Drawing Preparation
topics: Hands-on practice in creating design drawings
Drafting techniques and software tools
Incorporating all essential components into a design drawing
Review and feedback on drawings

classes.title: BOQ Preparation
topics: Understanding the purpose and structure of a BOQ
Creating a detailed BOQ for an HVAC project
Estimating material and labor costs
Importance of accuracy in BOQ preparation

classes.title: HVAC System Troubleshooting
topics: Identifying common HVAC system issues
Troubleshooting methods and techniques
Maintenance and preventive measures
Handling emergencies and repairs

classes.title: Course Summary and Discussion
topics: Recap and review of the entire course
Open discussion, questions, and answers
Sharing practical experiences and insights
Preparing for future challenges and advancements in HVAC
